general_advisory: Transplanting of vegetables should be done in the afternoon hour to avoid high temperature

advisory: Heat wave condition has been forecasted for the district on Monday and Tuesday, the weather condition will lead to flower and fruit drop in cucurbitaceous crop, so go for application of Light and frequent irrigation to avoid flower and fruit drop.

As the temperature is going to increase in coming days pointed gourd might be affected by fungal wilt, Soil drenching of 1.5gram Carbendazim or 1 gram Metalaxyl and Mancozeb mixture to control the wilt.

Heat wave condition has been forecasted for the district on Monday and Tuesday, the cattle's must not be allowed to graze outside during mid-day hour. The space left for ventilation must be covered with wet gunny bags. Provision for adequate clean drinking water.
